name: serverless-template
description: A boilerplate system design pattern to get started with Serverless

scripts.sync-node: cp src/.gitignore build/ && cp src/package.json build/
scripts.sync-gcp: cp src/app.yaml build/ && cp src/.gcloudignore build/
scripts.sync-all: npm run sync-node && npm run sync-sls && npm run sync-gcp && npm run sync-firebase
scripts.build: npm run build-ts && npm run sync-all
scripts.deploy-sls: npm run build && cd build && npm install --only=production && serverless deploy && cd ../ && rm -R build
scripts.deploy-gcp: npm run build && cd build && npm install --only=production && gcloud app deploy --project eztensorflowservices && cd ../ && rm -R build
scripts.merge-master: git checkout master && git merge dev && git push origin master && git checkout dev

author: Nicheal Pham
